I installed postfix on a server, And my django app on another server gets timeout when trying to connect to it
both the server's are on rackspace cloud, Any Idea guys?

Make sure that /etc/postfix/main.cf on the mail server doesn't have inet_interfaces set to 'loopback_only' or another name for localhost. You can eliminate your Django setup as the cause by successfully connecting to the mail server port with Telnet, first from the mail server (telnet 127.0.0.1 25) then from the other server (with the same numeric IP you entered into Django's settings).
